comments: This is the foundational health care bill that people usually mean when they say Obamacare.
This is the bill that accompanied HR 3590, that passed through the Senate reconciliation procedure and was passed by the House along with HR 3590 in the same night.
An acronym people often use for the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act.
Acronym for the Protect IP Act
Acronym for the Stop Online Piracy Act
SOPA and PIPA are part of the same idea, and people may know one acronym and not the other.
SOPA and PIPA are part of the same idea, and people may know one acronym and not the other.
CISPA stands for Cyber Intelligence Sharing and Protection Act
Acronym for National Defense Authorization Act. Proposed each year, the bill for 2012 was peculiar as it included provisions for indefinite detention of Americans without trial.
The senate version of the National Defense Authorization Act.
The bill that repealed Don't Ask Don't Tell in 2010.
Acronym for the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act
Acronym for title XIII of the American Recovery and Reinvestment Act, which is titled Health Information Technology for Economic and Clinical Health Act
Acronym for the Children's Online Privacy Protection Act
Acronym for the Gramm-Leach-Bliley Act, which repealed Glass-Steagall and de-regulated banking and insurance
Acronym for the Sarbanes-Oxley Act, which reformed corporate auditing and accounting
